  1. io.netty.bootstrap
  2. ChannelFactory

Uses of Interface
io.netty.bootstrap.ChannelFactory

Packages that use ChannelFactory
Package
Description
io.netty.bootstrap
The helper classes with fluent API which enable an easy implementation of typical client side and server side channel initialization.
io.netty.channel
The core channel API which is asynchronous and event-driven abstraction of various transports such as a NIO Channel.
io.netty.channel.udt.nio
UDT Transport for NIO Channels.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    final ChannelFactory<? extends C>
    AbstractBootstrapConfig.channelFactory()
    Returns the configured ChannelFactory or null if non is configured yet.

    AbstractBootstrap.channelFactory(ChannelFactory<? extends C> channelFactory)
    Deprecated.
    Use AbstractBootstrap.channelFactory(io.netty.channel.ChannelFactory) instead.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ReflectiveChannelFactory<T extends Channel>
